startPage.title: ðŸŽ‰ Welcome to your personal class editor!
startPage.description:
Your personal home to all your classes for the Fall 2021 Semester!
Simply press `Add` or `Remove` below to get started!

:notebook: __**Your classes not showing up properly?**__
> Use `/reload roles` to quickly fix that!
> 
> Or do you still have a role for a class you removed? Didn't sync up properly? That's alright!
> Simply type it into `Remove`, and we will do another sweep and dust it away! :broom:

:tea: __**Thank you for using Course Sync**__
> Course Sync's mission is to provide a safe, fun, and easy way to sync their courses along school servers that offer channels for students to collaborate and share ideas within.
> It is beyond humbling to have incredible users like yourself use Course Sync within yet another community.
> Thank you, the best of luck for this upcoming finals, and Happy Holidays :snowflake:
> 
> Also, remember to take frequent breaks when studying, the end of the semester is near :blue_heart:



(*crossed out courses are not supported by this Discord server*)

addClassPage.title: ðŸ“ Add-A-Class Wizard
addClassPage.description:
:sparkles: __**Set it, and forget it.**__
> With Course Sync, you won't need to struggle with non-functioning reaction roles or updating them every time you join new server. Input your courses, and we'll do the rest :tea:

__**[View Currently Supported Classes](<SUPPORTED_CLASSES_URL>)**__
> *with many many more to come!*

removeClassPage.title: ðŸŽ´ Remove-A-Class Wizard
removeClassPage.description:
:dizzy: __**There is no need to fear,**__
> Course removal is here!

:twisted_rightwards_arrows: __**Added the wrong class? Dropped one even?**__
> *Or maybe the role didn't disappear when you removed one earlier!*
> 
> Regardless of what it is, type in the class and we'll take care of the rest!

crnTooltip:
__**This bot supports the full-length version of the course identifier.**__
> __I.E.__
> `computer science` => `cs`
> `c s` => `cs`
> 
> Please input your course in the following format without the box braces []:
> 	`[course identifier] [course number]`
> 
> __I.E.__
> `cs172` `cs 172` `c s 172` `computer science 172`
